title: Fajã do Penedo
body: A populated place in the parish of Boaventura. There was a small chapel dedicated to Sant'Ana, built in 1768 by the landowner Antonio Francisco de Caires, which was demolished shortly after 1840. D. Maria dos Anjos Ribeiro built a chapel dedicated to the Immaculate Heart of Mary at this site in 1919.

1768: Construction of the chapel of Sant'Ana
1840: Demolition of the chapel of Sant'Ana
1919: Construction of the chapel dedicated to the Immaculate Heart of Mary
